main.name: Benjamin Tang
main.description: Computer Science, Business, Robotics @ Cornell. Class of 2025
main.bio: Quick learner seeking to gain experience in software development and robotics with proven skills in Java and collaboration. Eager to discover new insights by synthesizing technology, business, and art. Named as a Meinig Scholar, awarded to 1.3% of Cornell undergrads for leadership and academic excellence.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: B.S. Computer Science. Minors in Business and Robotics.
education.description: 3.85 GPA. Dean's List. Meinig Family Cornell National Scholar. Corporate Officer @ Association of Computer Science Undergrads. Software Developer @ Design & Tech Initiative. Member of Cornell Undergraduate Research Board.
AP Physics C Teaching Assistant. Director of Marketing & PR @ MV Robotics Team.

work.title: Startup Coach, Co-Founder of Monthly App Challenge
work.description: Devised year-long curriculum for student startups to ensure efficient ideation, development, and market entry. Currently mentoring an 4-person entreprenuership team. Coordinated weekly web dev workshops for ~30 students worldwide to apply CS in real-world projects. Bolstered workshop attendance by 600% in half year. Co-authored books+videos to increase global outreach.

work.title: Bioinformatics Research Assistant
work.description: Sequenced human and equine genes using DESeq and edgeR. Analyzed data using R data visualization. Presented research of gene expression and risk of knee osteoarthritis.
